jonrabone.junit

Class Helpers

  • java.lang.Object
    • jonrabone.junit.Helpers

  • public final class Helpers
extends Object
    Utility functions for working with annotations.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean classInSuite(Class<?> cls, SuiteName suiteName)
      Check if the class has any method which has an InSuite annotation matching the given suite name.
      static Set<Class<?>> filterClassesToSuite(SuiteName suiteName, Set<String> classNames)
      Filter a set of classnames to only those which are marked with or contain methods marked with InSuite annotations matching the given suite name.

    • Method Detail

      • matchesSuiteName

        public static boolean matchesSuiteName(InSuite inSuites,
                       SuiteName suiteName)
        Check if the suite name matches the list of suites passed in inSuites.
        Parameters:
        inSuites - annotation to test
        suiteName - suite name to match
        Returns:
        true if the suite name is found in the values of the inSuites annotation, false otherwise.

      • classInSuite

        public static boolean classInSuite(Class<?> cls,
                   SuiteName suiteName)
        Check if the class has any method which has an InSuite annotation matching the given suite name.
        Parameters:
        cls - the class to check.
        suiteName - the suite name to match.
        Returns:
        true if the suite name is found in the values of the inSuites annotation of any method on the class, false otherwise.

      • methodInSuite

        public static boolean methodInSuite(Method method,
                    InSuite classInSuite,
                    SuiteName suiteName)
        Check if the method has an InSuite annotation matching the given suite name, given any annotation present on the parent class.
        Parameters:
        method - the method to check.
        classInSuite - the InSuite annotation on the parent class, or null.
        suiteName - the suite name to match.
        Returns:
        true if the suite name is found in the values of the inSuites annotation of the method and it does not conflict with any annotation on the parent class, false otherwise.

      • findAnnotatedClasses

        public static Set<String> findAnnotatedClasses(Class<?> baseClass,
                               Class<?> annotationClass)
                                        throws IOException
        Find all classes on the same classpath as a supplied base class with the given annotation. Only class and method annotations are scanned.
        Parameters:
        baseClass - class to determine base classpath from.
        annotationClass - annotation to look for.
        Returns:
        a set of class names.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an IO error occurred.

      • filterClassesToSuite

        public static Set<Class<?>> filterClassesToSuite(SuiteName suiteName,
                                 Set<String> classNames)
                                          throws ClassNotFoundException
        Filter a set of classnames to only those which are marked with or contain methods marked with InSuite annotations matching the given suite name.
        Parameters:
        suiteName - the suite name to match.
        classNames - class names to scan.
        Returns:
        a set of filtered classes, may be empty.
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException - if a class cannot be loaded.
